Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, given its worth of $8,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the opportunity to bring value to someone who appreciates it as much as you do, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exceptional price. I kindly propose a purchase price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a fair deal while allowing me to maximize the value of my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
